original_text: which had the golden altar of incense and the gold-covered ark of the covenant. This ark contained the gold jar of manna, Aaron’s staff that had budded, and the stone tablets of the covenant.
korean_text: 금 향로와 사면을 금으로 싼 언약궤가 있고 그 안에 만나를 담은 금 항아리와 아론의 싹난 지팡이와 언약의 돌판들이 있고

sentences.original_text: which had the golden altar of incense
and the gold-covered ark of the covenant
This ark contained the gold jar of manna
sentences.korean_translation: 이 궈는 금 항아리에 담긴 만나를 담고 있었으며

sentences.original_text: and the stone tablets of the covenant
